unnormalised: Planning for the annual Diwali mela in Sector 17 is underway! The Sector 17 Residents’ Welfare Association (RWA) announced that the mela will be held from 28/10/2024 to 02/11/2024. Expect the usual festive vibes, bhai!
normalised: Planning for the annual Diwali mela in Sector seventeen is underway! The Sector seventeen Residents’ Welfare Association (R-W-A) announced that the mela will be held from twenty eighth October two thousand and twenty four to second November two thousand and twenty four. Expect the usual festive vibes, bhai!

unnormalised: The RWA is coordinating with local vendors. Stalls need to be booked by 15/09/2024, and payments must be made before 20/09/2024, 5 PM. Last year's mela was a huge hit, but this year, they are prepone-ing the closing time to 10:00 PM due to noise concerns from residents living nearby.
normalised: The R-W-A is coordinating with local vendors. Stalls need to be booked by fifteenth September two thousand and twenty four, and payments must be made before twentieth September two thousand and twenty four, five P-M. Last year's mela was a huge hit, but this year, they are prepone-ing the closing time to ten P-M due to noise concerns from residents living nearby.

unnormalised: This Diwali mela is expected to be even bigger, with cultural performances scheduled daily from 6:30 PM to 8:30 PM. Do come and enjoy the festive cheer!
normalised: This Diwali mela is expected to be even bigger, with cultural performances scheduled daily from six thirty P-M to eight thirty P-M. Do come and enjoy the festive cheer!
